ARABIC: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ يُبْدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have they not seen how Allah brings creation out of nothing, then reproduces it? That is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they not see how God originates creation, then reverts it back? This is indeed how inevitably the law of God works;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have they never observed how Allah creates for the first time and then repeats it? Indeed (to repeat the creation of a thing) is even easier for Allah (than creating it for the first time).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have they not seen how God begins the creation and then turns it back? This is not difficult at all for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Have they not seen how Allah initiates the creation, then will create it again? Indeed that is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: See they not how Allah originates the creation, then repeats it. Verily, that is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! do they not consider how Allah originates the creation, then reproduces it? Surely that is easy to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: (Have they not seen how God originates creation, then brings it back again? Surely that is an easy matter for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: See they not how Allah produceth creation, then reproduceth it? Lo! for Allah that is easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they not see how God originates creation, then reproduces it? That surely is easy for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Observe they not what wise Allah originateth creation? And then He shall restore it. Verily for Allah that is easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have they not regarded how Allah originates the creation? Then He will bring it back. That is indeed easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: See they not how Allah originates creation, then repeats it: truly that is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: See they not how Allah originates creation, then repeats it. Verily, that is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do they not see how Allah originates the Creation, and then brings it back? That is an easy matter for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have they not seen how God originates the creation, and then reproduces it? This is easy for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have they not considered how Allah begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:19] Have they not seen (yaraw, or taraw, ‘have you not seen?’), observed, how God originates creation (yubdi’u, from [4th form] abda’a; a variant reading has yabda‘u from [1st form] bada’a, both with the same meaning: ‘He creates them originally’) then, He, restores it, namely, creation, just as He originated them? Surely that, which is mentioned of the first and the second [acts of] creation, is easy for God, so how can they deny the second one?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (See they not) have the disbelievers of Mecca not been informed in the Book (how Allah produceth creation) from a sperm drop, (then reproduceth it) on the Day of Judgement? (Lo! for Allah that is easy) its production and reproduction is easy.
